page.title: 05May Festival
page.content: Every year we have a May Festival at the Howard School.This year it was our 62nd.We start off by processing through village on two dreys pulled by trac- tors.Our parents,friends and other people in the village follow us,and we sing songs about the spring and may- time.It is really good fun.Each year the eldest girls in the school are may- queens.I was a may-queen this year.We are flower queens.I was a "Foxglove." When we finish the procession we get ready for the crowning of the queens.I had two maids.One carried my purple sash,and one my crown.Then comes the may-pole dancing.All the juniors dance round the pole doing "Amo Amas", "Spiders Web" and "Six Plaits".The May Festival is a most enjoyable custom.
